title: NO Chinese in the option of league universe
body:
Hope to add Chinese language into the option
feel sad when I want to find a Chinese version but there is no that option

replies.body:
Hey there -- not sure if you are looking for a Chinese version of the Universe website, but just in case you are, you can find them here:
**Simplified Chinese**
Universe: http://yz.lol.qq.com/
Map: http://yz.lol.qq.com/zh_CN/map/index.html
(This is hosted by Tencent, so the domain is different)

**Traditional Chinese**
Universe: http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/zh_TW/
Map: https://map.leagueoflegends.com/zh_TW
i just up voted this because they really have to do it ... even though i am not Chinese and i dont know anything about it lol
